title: No OpenType font file icon after generating font
content:
Hi.  
I have a problem when generating OpenType font in FontLab 4.6 for Windows. After creating outlines and preparing OT features when I generate font it shows me TTF font file icon. As a test I take standard Windows OT font, import in FontLab, make no chages, generate as OT TTF font and the same result - TTF icon insted of “O” OpenType font icon.  
But when I generate OTF (PS flavored) file everithing OK with icon.

Thanks  
Akhra

 [‹ Cheap/free font editor](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108031231/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17762 "Go to previous forum topic") [Basic OT errors ... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108031231/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18455 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Akhra

comments.content:
for TT flavored OTFs, you must have the font digitially “signed” for the O icon to be associated with the the font.

[http://www.typophile.com/node/2900](http://web.archive.org/web/20080108031231/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2900 "http://www.typophile.com/node/2900")
